languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить. За последние дни я получила несколько сообщений с разных палуб о странностях в работе корабельных сервиторов и когитаторов. Машинные духи неспокойны и непокорны — ни одна технолитания или ритуал усмирения не избавляет их от строптивости. Техножрецы справляются с корабельными системами, но сервиторы... они сбиваются с работы, нарушают приказы, меняют предписанные ритуалы или же вовсе замирают, словно погружаясь в транс".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить. За последние дни я получила несколько сообщений с разных палуб о странностях в работе корабельных сервиторов и когитаторов. Машинные духи неспокойны и непокорны — ни одна технолитания или ритуал усмирения не избавляет их от строптивости. Техножрецы справляются с корабельными системами, но сервиторы... они сбиваются с работы, нарушают приказы, меняют предписанные ритуалы или же вовсе замирают, словно погружаясь в транс".

languages.text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить. За последние дни я получила несколько сообщений с разных палуб о странностях в работе корабельных сервиторов и когитаторов. Машинные духи неспокойны и непокорны — ни одна технолитания или ритуал усмирения не избавляет их от строптивости. Техножрецы справляются с корабельными системами, но сервиторы... они сбиваются с работы, нарушают приказы, меняют предписанные ритуалы или же вовсе замирают, словно погружаясь в транс".

traits.locale_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days I received several messages from different decks that complain about the oddities in the regular behaviour of the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or a ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The tech-priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they mess up their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals or down right freeze as if in a trance."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or a ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The tech-priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they mess up their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals or down right freeze as if in a trance."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes down right freeze as if in a trance."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes down right freeze as if in a trance."

"Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes down right freeze as if in a trance."

languages.text: « J'ai un rapport pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ces derniers jours, j'ai reçu des plaintes émanant de plusieurs ponts au sujet du comportement erratique des cogitateurs et des servitors du vaisseau. Les esprits de la machine sont agités et refusent d'obéir, et ni les technolitanies, ni les rituels de pacification n'ont permis de les remettre sur le droit chemin. Les technoprêtres pourront se charger des systèmes du vaisseau, mais il en va autrement des servitors... Ils commettent des erreurs, se rebellent contre l'autorité et ne respectent pas les rituels prévus, quand ils ne cessent pas purement et simplement de fonctionner ; c'est comme s'ils étaient plongés dans une sorte de transe. »
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai un rapport pour vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ces derniers jours, j'ai reçu des plaintes émanant de plusieurs ponts au sujet du comportement erratique des cogitateurs et des servitors du vaisseau. Les esprits de la machine sont agités et refusent d'obéir, et ni les technolitanies, ni les rituels de pacification n'ont permis de les remettre sur le droit chemin. Les technoprêtres pourront se charger des systèmes du vaisseau, mais il en va autrement des servitors... Ils commettent des erreurs, se rebellent contre l'autorité et ne respectent pas les rituels prévus, quand ils ne cessent pas purement et simplement de fonctionner ; c'est comme s'ils étaient plongés dans une sorte de transe. »

languages.text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain. In den letzten paar Tagen habe ich mehrere Beschwerden von verschiedenen Decks erhalten. Beschwerden über anormales Verhalten der Cogitatoren und Servitoren des Schiffs. Die Maschinengeister sind rastlos und rebellisch, und keine Tech-Litanei und kein Befriedungsritual kann sie von diesem Starrsinn abbringen. Die Techpriester können sich um die Systeme des Schiffs kümmern, doch die Servitoren ... Sie begehen Fehler, missachten Befehle, ändern die zugewiesenen Rituale, manchmal frieren sie einfach ein, als würden sie in eine Trance fallen."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."

traits.locale_text: "Erbitte Erlaubnis, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain. In den letzten paar Tagen habe ich mehrere Beschwerden von verschiedenen Decks erhalten. Beschwerden über anormales Verhalten der Cogitatoren und Servitoren des Schiffs. Die Maschinengeister sind rastlos und rebellisch, und keine Tech-Litanei und kein Befriedungsritual kann sie von diesem Starrsinn abbringen. Die Techpriester können sich um die Systeme des Schiffs kümmern, doch die Servitoren ... Sie begehen Fehler, missachten Befehle, ändern die zugewiesenen Rituale, manchmal frieren sie einfach ein, als würden sie eine Trance fallen."

languages.text: «Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán. Estos últimos días, las diferentes cubiertas me han enviado mensajes quejándose sobre el extraño comportamiento de los cogitadores y servidores de la nave. Los espíritus máquina se muestran inquietos e ingobernables y ninguna tecnoletanía o ritual de pacificación es suficiente para controlarlos. Los tecnosacerdotes pueden encargarse de los sistemas de la nave, pero los servidores... no dejan de cometer errores, desobedecer órdenes, cambiar los rituales asignados, o paralizarse por completo como si estuvieran en trance».
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."

traits.locale_text: «Permiso para informar, Lord Capitán. Estos últimos días, las diferentes cubiertas me han enviado mensajes quejándose sobre el extraño comportamiento de los cogitadores y servidores de la nave. Los espíritus máquina se muestran inquietos e ingobernables y ninguna tecnoletanía o ritual de pacificación es suficiente para controlarlos. Los tecnosacerdotes pueden encargarse de los sistemas de la nave, pero los servidores... no dejan de cometer errores, desobedecer órdenes, cambiar los rituales asignados, o paralizarse por completo como si estuvieran en trance».

languages.text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。在过去的几天里，我收到了来自不同甲板的信息，船员反映飞船上的沉思者与机仆发生了异常状况。那些机魂躁动不安，叛逆不已，无论是什么样的技术祷告还是安抚仪式，都无法让它们摆脱这种冥顽不灵的状态。技术神甫可以负责解决飞船系统的问题，但那些机仆……它们在执行任务时会出错，不服从命令，会改变既定的指令，有时甚至还会像精神恍惚一样愣在那里。”
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我向您报告，舰长大人。在过去的几天里，我收到了来自不同甲板的信息，船员反映飞船上的思考器与奴工发生了异常状况。那些机魂躁动不安，叛逆不已，无论是什么样的技术祷告还是安抚仪式，都无法让它们摆脱这种冥顽不灵的状态。技术祭司可以负责解决飞船系统的问题，但那些奴工……它们在执行任务时会出错，不服从命令，会改变既定的指令，有时甚至还会像精神恍惚一样愣在那里。”

languages.text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。ここ数日、異なるデッキから何件か苦情が届いていて、どれも船内の考算機とサーヴィターに異常な動きが見られるとのことです。機械精霊は落ち着きがなく反抗的で、鎮静の技術祈祷や儀式でも強情な精霊達を沈めることができません。技術司祭は船のシステムに対応できますが、サーヴィターの方は…彼らはタスクでエラーを犯し、命令に背き、割り当てられた儀式を変更し、たまに放心したように完全にフリーズしたりしています」
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."

traits.locale_text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。ここ数日、異なるデッキから何件か苦情が届いていて、どれも船内の考算機とサーヴィターに異常な動きが見られるとのことです。機械精霊は落ち着きがなく反抗的で、鎮静の技術祈祷や儀式でも強情な精霊達を沈めることができません。技術司祭は船のシステムに対応できますが、サーヴィターの方は…彼らはタスクでエラーを犯し、命令に背き、割り当てられた儀式を変更し、たまに放心したように完全にフリーズしたりしています」

languages.text: "Rapor vermek için izin istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Geçtiğimiz birkaç gün içinde farklı güvertelerden, geminin kavramsayarlarının ve hizmetörlerinin anormal davranışları hakkında şikâyetler aldım. Makine ruhları huzursuz, isyankâr. Hiçbir tekno ilahi veya ayin, onların bu dik başlılığını yatıştıramıyor. Tekno Rahipler, geminin sistemleriyle ilgilenebilir ancak hizmetörler... Görevlerinde hatalar yapıyor, emirlere itaatsizlik ediyor, onlara atanmış ayinleri değiştiriyor ve hatta bazen transa girmiş gibi donakalıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Permission to report, Lord Captain. Over the past few days, I received several messages from different decks, complaining about anomalous behaviours in the ship's cogitators and servitors. The machine spirits are restless and rebellious, and no tech-litany or ritual of pacification can rid them of this obstinacy. The Tech-Priests can deal with the vessel's systems, but the servitors... they make errors in their tasks, disobey orders, change the assigned rituals, or sometimes downright freeze as if in a trance."
